forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Windy with showers continuing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 48F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. E winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low near 35F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 1C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 34F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
